collectionProcessors.description:
These are coming from the custom metadata and the "Has Wages" fields are phase orders 4, 5, and 6. Filter "Has Wages" records from the NCS Onboarding Templates collection.
Filed Returns in Current Year = 4 Prior Quarter Items = 5 Current Quarter Wage/Tax Items = 6
collectionProcessors.name: Filter_Collection_Current_Quarter_Wage_Tax_Items
collectionProcessors.label: Filter Collection - Current Quarter Wage/Tax Items

collectionProcessors.description:
These are coming from the custom metadata and the "Has Wages" fields are phase orders 4, 5, and 6. Filter "Has Wages" records from the NCS Onboarding Templates collection.

Flow.description: Launched from Flow: Contract OnCreate - Payroll Application

formulas.description: Formats the current Date as MM/DD/YYYY instead of text.
formulas.name: CurrentDate

formulas.description: If the Program name is longer than 80 characters, cuts all characters after 77 and appends "..." at the end.
formulas.name: FormattedProgramName

formulas.description: If the subject is longer than 80 characters, cuts all characters after 77 and appends "..." at the end.
formulas.name: FormattedProjectName
